faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our van rental service

location.question: Where can I pick up the van?
location.answer: All vans are picked up and returned at Olewish 4, 22177 Hamburg. We also offer delivery service within Hamburg for an additional fee.

insurance.question: What insurance is included?
insurance.answer: Basic third-party liability insurance is included. We offer comprehensive coverage and business use insurance for additional protection.

driver.question: Can I rent a driver with the van?
driver.answer: Yes, we provide professional drivers experienced in moving and transport services. Drivers are available at €25/hour.

moving.question: Do you provide moving helpers?
moving.answer: Yes, we offer moving helpers at €15/hour per person. They can assist with loading, unloading, and furniture moving.

cancellation.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before pickup. Late cancellations may incur a fee.

delivery.question: Do you deliver vans to other locations?
delivery.answer: We primarily serve Hamburg area. Delivery outside Hamburg may be available for additional fees.
